name: rac-folder-search
description: Fast folder and file search with full symbolic link support for VS Code

fold-search.followSymlinks.markdownDescription:
Whether to follow symbolic links during indexing.

**Enabled (true):** The scanner will follow symlinks and index their target directories. Symlinked folders will be marked with ðŸ”—.

**Disabled (false):** Symlinks will be ignored and their contents won't be indexed.

**Recommendation:** Keep enabled if you have symlinked directories (like `cases -> /path/to/cases/`).

fold-search.maxDepth.markdownDescription:
Maximum directory depth to scan from workspace root.

**Examples:**
- `1`: Only scan workspace root folders
- `2`: Scan root + 1 level (e.g., workspace/cases/case-folders)
- `3`: Scan root + 2 levels (includes subfolders in case folders)
- `10`: Deep scanning (may include many nested folders)

**For symlinked directories:** If you have `workspace/cases -> /path/to/cases/`, depth is counted from workspace root:
- Depth 0: workspace/
- Depth 1: workspace/cases/ (symlink)
- Depth 2: workspace/cases/CASE001/ (first level inside symlink)
- Depth 3: workspace/cases/CASE001/subfolder/ (second level)

**Recommendation:** Use `2` to index only the first level of folders inside a symlinked directory, avoiding unnecessary subfolders.

fold-search.includeFiles.markdownDescription:
Include files in search results (in addition to folders).

**Enabled (true):** Both files and folders will appear in search results.

**Disabled (false):** Only folders will appear in search results.

**Recommendation:** Disable (false) for faster performance and cleaner results when you only need to search folders.

fold-search.cacheExpiryMinutes.markdownDescription:
Cache expiration time in minutes.

The scanner caches results to avoid re-scanning on every search. After this time, the cache expires and a new scan will be triggered.

**Examples:**
- `5`: Cache expires after 5 minutes (frequent updates)
- `10`: Default - good balance
- `30`: Cache expires after 30 minutes (for stable directories)
- `60`: Cache expires after 1 hour (for rarely changing directories)

**Recommendation:** Use `10-30` minutes for most cases. Increase if your directory structure rarely changes.

fold-search.excludePatterns.markdownDescription:
Directory names to exclude from indexing.

Folders matching these names will be skipped during scanning. Hidden files/folders (starting with `.`) are automatically excluded.

**Default exclusions:**
- `node_modules`: Node.js dependencies
- `.git`: Git repository data
- `dist`, `build`: Build output folders
- `__pycache__`: Python cache

**To add more:** Add directory names to this list (e.g., `temp`, `cache`, `logs`).

fold-search.maxResults.markdownDescription:
Maximum number of items to index.

The scanner will stop after indexing this many items to prevent performance issues.

**Examples:**
- `1000`: For small projects
- `5000`: Default - suitable for most projects (1000-2000 folders)
- `10000`: For large projects with many folders
- `20000`: For very large projects

**Note:** If you're hitting this limit, you'll see fewer results than expected. Increase this value or reduce `maxDepth` to focus on important folders.

**Recommendation:** Use `5000` for typical use cases. Increase if you have more folders to index.
